page.title: 20SMITH'S FARM
page.content: The farm was built in the early 1800's The land covers about 36 acres and is all grazing land which his 46 cows use. Also he rents 5 acres. His other animals include 20 pigs, a dog, some cats and a few hens. All of his cows and pigs go to market to be sold and killed for meat. Mr Smith has been farming for 40 years When he was young he kept a few pigs, but farming has never run in his family. He has not kept milking cows for 12 years.In winter the cattle come indoors until the weather gets warm. Mr Smith owns 2 tractors and all the equipment for haymaking. He employs extra helpers at hay time, but the rest of the time he and his wife do the work.
